==History==
==History==
â
[[File:Portable Workspace Creator.png|thumb|Portable Workspace Creator on Windows 8 build 7955]]
+
[[File:Portable Workspace Creator.png|thumb|''Portable Workspace Creator'' on Windows 8 build 7955]]
In April, 2011, after the leak of Windows 8 build 7850,<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.engadget.com/2011/04/13/windows-8-leaked-caught-looking-a-lot-like-windows-7/ |title=Windows 8 leaked, caught looking a lot like Windows 7 |publisher=Engadget |date= |accessdate=2011-09-25}}</ref> some users noticed that those builds included a program called "Portable Workspace Creator", indicating it was intended to create bootable USB drives of Windows 8.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.winrumors.com/windows-8-portable-workspace-allows-you-to-run-windows-from-a-usb-device/ |title=Windows 8: Portable Workspace allows you to run Windows from a USB device |publisher=WinRumors |date=2011-04-15 |accessdate=2011-09-25}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.engadget.com/2011/04/15/windows-8-to-feature-usb-runnable-portable-workspaces-sales-of/ |title=Windows 8 to feature USB-runnable Portable Workspaces, sales of 16GB thumb drives set to soar |publisher=Engadget |date= |accessdate=2011-09-25}}</ref>
In April, 2011, after the leak of Windows 8 build 7850,<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.engadget.com/2011/04/13/windows-8-leaked-caught-looking-a-lot-like-windows-7/ |title=Windows 8 leaked, caught looking a lot like Windows 7 |publisher=Engadget |date= |accessdate=2011-09-25}}</ref> some users noticed that those builds included a program called "Portable Workspace Creator", indicating it was intended to create bootable USB drives of Windows 8.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.winrumors.com/windows-8-portable-workspace-allows-you-to-run-windows-from-a-usb-device/ |title=Windows 8: Portable Workspace allows you to run Windows from a USB device |publisher=WinRumors |date=2011-04-15 |accessdate=2011-09-25}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.engadget.com/2011/04/15/windows-8-to-feature-usb-runnable-portable-workspaces-sales-of/ |title=Windows 8 to feature USB-runnable Portable Workspaces, sales of 16GB thumb drives set to soar |publisher=Engadget |date= |accessdate=2011-09-25}}</ref>
